title: Effects of creatine on strength and hypertrophy in trained men

sections.abstract: This randomized trial examined the effects of daily creatine monohydrate supplementation on strength and muscle hypertrophy in resistance-trained men over 12 weeks...
sections.introduction: Creatine has been repeatedly shown to increase high-intensity exercise capacity, but its impact in already trained lifters remains an area of interest...
sections.results: The creatine group significantly increased 1RM squat and bench press compared to placebo, and gained more lean mass as measured by DXA...
sections.conclusion: Creatine supplementation provides additional strength and hypertrophy benefits even in trained individuals following a structured resistance program...
